natural solution: We note that $4096=2^{12}$, so the expression becomes $$\sqrt{\sqrt{2^{12}} + \sqrt[3]{2^{12}} + \sqrt[4]{2^{12}}} = \sqrt{2^6 + 2^4 + 2^3} = \sqrt{64+16+8} = \sqrt{88}$$
Factoring out $4$ from $88$ gives $\boxed{2\sqrt{22}}$, which cannot be simplified further.
